Text: Almost spit out my food when he grabbed the breast implants and flubber-bustered them, LOL.  d/l'd at 1.5MB/sec... thanks seeders

V-9/A-9/Great Show/Thanks for the upload

Plea to Release Groups - Release more stuff encoded in H264 Standard Def.
30 min TV show less than 100 Mb, 1 Hr TV show less than 200Mb, Movies 250-500 Mb.
All near DVD quality same as Divx/Xvid.
Why not release 2 versions of everything, one standard size, one small?
For the many with limited bandwidth or slower connections (3G, basic DSL, lowest tier cable).
Check out Blueman's stuff. Thanks!
Thank you for all the time you took out of your daily life to post these files.
